# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -O nfvo-umc-1.0.0-RC0.zip https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1020/org/openo/nfvo/monitor/umc/umc-api/umc-standalone/1.0.0-RC0/umc-standalone-1.0.0-RC0.zip
RUN unzip -o -B nfvo-umc-1.0.0-RC0.zip
RUN rm -f nfvo-umc-1.0.0-RC0.zip
EXPOSE 8205
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0-RC0 autorelease-1020 > VERSION
